   16: 
   17: -module(oauth_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   24: 
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Suite configuration
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     [
   32:      {group, token_login},
   33:      {group, token_revocation},
   34:      {group, provision_token},
   35:      {group, commands},
   36:      {group, cleanup}
   37:     ].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [
   41:      {token_login, [sequence], token_login_tests()},
   42:      {token_revocation, [sequence], token_revocation_tests()},
   43:      {provision_token, [], [provision_token_login]},
   44:      {commands, [], [revoke_token_cmd_when_no_token,
   45:                      revoke_token_cmd]},
   46:      {cleanup, [], [token_removed_on_user_removal]}
   47:     ].
   48: 
   49: token_login_tests() ->
   50:     [
   51:      request_tokens_test,
   52:      login_access_token_test,
   53:      login_refresh_token_test,
   54:      login_with_other_users_token,
   55:      login_with_malformed_token
   56:     ].
   57: 
   58: token_revocation_tests() ->
   59:     [
   60:      login_with_revoked_token_test,
   61:      token_revocation_test
   62:     ].
   63: 
   64: suite() ->
   65:     escalus:suite().
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: %% Init & teardown
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   71:     Config = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_last, Config0),
   72:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   73: 
   74: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   75:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config),
   76:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   77: 
   78: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   79:     Config = case GroupName of
   80:                  commands -> ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0);
   81:                  _ -> Config0
   82:              end,
   83:     case get_auth_method() of
   84:         external ->
   85:             {skip, "external authentication requires plain password"};
   86:         _ ->
   87:             config_password_format(GroupName),
   88:             Config2 = escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([bob, alice])),
   89:             assert_password_format(GroupName, Config2)
   90:     end.
   91: 
   92: end_per_group(cleanup, Config) ->
   93:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice]));
   94: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   95:     set_store_password(plain),
   96:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([bob, alice])).
   97: 
   98: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0) ->
   99:     clean_token_db(),
  100:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0).
  101: 
  102: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  103:     clean_token_db(),
  104:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  105: 
  106: %%
  107: %% Tests
  108: %%
  109: 
  110: request_tokens_test(Config) ->
  111:     request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob).
  112: 
  113: login_with_revoked_token_test(Config) ->
  114:     %% given
  115:     RevokedToken = get_revoked_token(Config, bob),
  116:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, RevokedToken).
  117: 
  118: token_login_failure(Config, User, Token) ->
  119:     %% when
  120:     Result = login_with_token(Config, User, Token),
  121:     % then
  122:     {{auth_failed, _}, _, _} = Result.
  123: 
  124: get_revoked_token(Config, UserName) ->
  125:     BJID = escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserName),
  126:     JID = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(jid, from_binary, [BJID]),
  127:     Token = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token, [refresh, JID]),
  128:     ValidSeqNo = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token_odbc, get_valid_sequence_number,
  129:                                       [JID]),
  130:     RevokedToken0 = record_set(Token, [{5, invalid_sequence_no(ValidSeqNo)},
  131:                                        {7, undefined},
  132:                                        {8, undefined}]),
  133:     RevokedToken = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token_with_mac, [RevokedToken0]),
  134:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, serialize, [RevokedToken]).
  135: 
  136: invalid_sequence_no(SeqNo) ->
  137:     SeqNo - 1.
  138: 
  139: request_tokens_once_logged_in(Config) ->
  140:     request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob).
  141: 
  142: request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, User) ->
  143:     Self = self(),
  144:     Ref = make_ref(),
  145:     escalus:story(Config, [{User, 1}], fun(Client) ->
  146:                                                ClientShortJid = escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Client),
  147:                                                R = escalus_stanza:query_el(?NS_ESL_TOKEN_AUTH, []),
  148:                                                IQ = escalus_stanza:iq(ClientShortJid, <<"get">>, R),
  149:                                                escalus:send(Client, IQ),
  150:                                                Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  151:                                                {AT, RT} = extract_tokens(Result),
  152:                                                Self ! {tokens, Ref, {AT,RT}}
  153:                                        end),
  154:     receive
  155:         {tokens, Ref, Tokens} ->
  156:             Tokens
  157:     after
  158:         1000 -> error
  159:     end.
  160: 
  161: login_access_token_test(Config) ->
  162:     Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  163:     login_access_token_impl(Config, Tokens).
  164: 
  165: login_refresh_token_test(Config) ->
  166:     Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  167:     login_refresh_token_impl(Config, Tokens).
  168: 
  169: %% Scenario describing JID spoofing with an eavesdropped / stolen token.
  170: login_with_other_users_token(Config) ->
  171:     %% given user and another user's token
  172:     {_, BobsToken} = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  173:     AliceSpec = user_authenticating_with_token(Config, alice, BobsToken),
  174:     %% when we try to log in
  175:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  176:                  stream_features,
  177:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  178:                  authenticate,
  179:                  fun (Alice, Props, Features) ->
  180:                          escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:bind(<<"test-resource">>)),
  181:                          BindReply = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, bind_reply),
  182:                          {Alice, [{bind_reply, BindReply} | Props], Features}
  183:                  end],
  184:     {ok, _, Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  185:     %% then the server recognizes us as the other user
  186:     LoggedInAs = extract_bound_jid(proplists:get_value(bind_reply, Props)),
  187:     true = escalus_utils:get_username(LoggedInAs) /= escalus_users:get_username(Config, AliceSpec).
  188: 
  189: login_with_malformed_token(Config) ->
  190:     %% given
  191:     MalformedToken = <<"malformed ", (crypto:rand_bytes(64))/bytes>>,
  192:     %% when / then
  193:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, MalformedToken).
  194: 
  195: login_refresh_token_impl(Config, {_AccessToken, RefreshToken}) ->
  196:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, bob),
  197: 
  198:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  199:                  stream_features,
  200:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  201:                  maybe_use_compression
  202:                 ],
  203: 
  204:     {ok, ClientConnection, Props, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec, ConnSteps),
  205:     Props2 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, Props, {oauth_token, RefreshToken}),
  206:     AuthResultToken = (catch escalus_auth:auth_sasl_oauth(ClientConnection, Props2)),
  207:     ok.
  208: 
  209: %% users logs in using access token he obtained in previous session (stream has been
  210: %% already reset)
  211: login_access_token_impl(Config, {AccessToken, _RefreshToken}) ->
  212:     {{ok, _ }, ClientConnection, Props2} = login_with_token(Config, bob, AccessToken),
  213:     escalus_connection:reset_parser(ClientConnection),
  214:     {Props3, []} = escalus_session:start_stream(ClientConnection, Props2),
  215:     NewFeatures = escalus_session:stream_features(ClientConnection, Props3, []),
  216:     %todo: create step out of above lines
  217:     {NewClientConnection, Props4, NewFeatures2} =
  218:         escalus_session:bind(ClientConnection, Props3, NewFeatures),
  219:     {NewClientConnection2, _Props5, _NewFeatures3} =
  220:         escalus_session:session(NewClientConnection, Props4, NewFeatures2),
  221:     escalus:send(NewClientConnection2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  222:     escalus:assert(is_presence, escalus:wait_for_stanza(NewClientConnection2)).
  223: 
  224: login_with_token(Config, User, Token) ->
  225:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  226:     ConnSteps = [start_stream,
  227:                  stream_features,
  228:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  229:                  maybe_use_compression],
  230:     {ok, ClientConnection, Props, _Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnSteps),
  231:     Props2 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, Props, {oauth_token, Token}),
  232:     AuthResult = (catch escalus_auth:auth_sasl_oauth(ClientConnection, Props2)),
  233:     {AuthResult, ClientConnection, Props2}.
  234: 
  235: token_revocation_test(Config) ->
  236:     %% given
  237:     {Owner, _SeqNoToRevoke, Token} = get_owner_seqno_to_revoke(Config, bob),
  238:     %% when
  239:     ok = revoke_token(Owner),
  240:     %% then
  241:     token_login_failure(Config, bob, Token).
  242: 
  243: get_owner_seqno_to_revoke(Config, User) ->
  244:     {_, RefreshToken} = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, User),
  245:     [_, BOwner, _, SeqNo, _] = binary:split(RefreshToken, <<0>>, [global]),
  246:     Owner = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(jid, from_binary, [BOwner]),
  247:     {Owner, binary_to_integer(SeqNo), RefreshToken}.
  248: 
  249: revoke_token(Owner) ->
  250:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, revoke, [Owner]).
  251: 
  252: revoke_token_cmd_when_no_token(Config) ->
  253:     %% given existing user with no token
  254:     %% when revoking token
  255:     R = mimctl(Config, ["revoke_token", escalus_users:get_jid(Config, bob)]),
  256:     %% then no token was found
  257:     "User or token not found.\n" = R.
  258: 
  259: revoke_token_cmd(Config) ->
  260:     %% given existing user and token present in the database
  261:     _Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  262:     %% when
  263:     R = mimctl(Config, ["revoke_token", escalus_users:get_jid(Config, bob)]),
  264:     %% then
  265:     "Revoked.\n" = R.
  266: 
  267: token_removed_on_user_removal(Config) ->
  268:     %% given existing user with token and XMPP (de)registration available
  269:     _Tokens = request_tokens_once_logged_in_impl(Config, bob),
  270:     true = is_xmpp_registration_available(escalus_users:get_server(Config, bob)),
  271:     %% when user account is deleted
  272:     S = fun (Bob) ->
  273:                 IQ = escalus_stanza:remove_account(),
  274:                 escalus:send(Bob, IQ),
  275:                 timer:sleep(500),
  276:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [IQ], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob))
  277:         end,
  278:     escalus:story(Config, [{bob, 1}], S),
  279:     %% then token database doesn't contain user's tokens
  280:     {selected, _, []} = get_users_token(Config, bob).
  281: 
  282: provision_token_login(Config) ->
  283:     %% given
  284:     VCard = make_vcard(Config, bob),
  285:     ProvisionToken = make_provision_token(Config, bob, VCard),
  286:     UserSpec = user_authenticating_with_token(Config, bob, ProvisionToken),
  287:     %% when logging in with provision token
  288:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec),
  289:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  290:     %% then user's vcard is placed into the database on login
  291:     Result = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Conn),
  292:     VCard = exml_query:subelement(Result, <<"vCard">>).
  293: 
  294: %%
  295: %% Helpers
  296: %%
  297: 
  298: extract_tokens(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = [#xmlel{name = <<"items">>} = Items ]}) ->
  299:     ATD = exml_query:path(Items, [{element, <<"access_token">>}, cdata]),
  300:     RTD = exml_query:path(Items, [{element, <<"refresh_token">>}, cdata]),
  301:     {base64:decode(ATD), base64:decode(RTD)}.
  302: 
  303: get_auth_method()        ->
  304:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  305:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  306:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, store_type,
  307:                          [XMPPDomain]).
  308: 
  309: set_store_password(Type) ->
  310:     XMPPDomain = escalus_ejabberd:unify_str_arg(
  311:                    ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)),
  312:     AuthOpts = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,
  313:                                     [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}]),
  314:     NewAuthOpts = lists:keystore(password_format, 1, AuthOpts, {password_format, Type}),
  315:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, add_local_option,
  316:                          [{auth_opts, XMPPDomain}, NewAuthOpts]).
  317: 
  318: config_password_format(login_scram) ->
  319:     set_store_password(scram);
  320: config_password_format(_) ->
  321:     set_store_password(plain).
  322: 
  323: assert_password_format(GroupName, Config) ->
  324:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config),
  325:     [verify_format(GroupName, User) || User <- Users],
  326:     Config.
  327: 
  328: verify_format(GroupName, {_User, Props}) ->
  329:     Username = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(proplists:get_value(username, Props)),
  330:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, Props),
  331:     Password = proplists:get_value(password, Props),
  332:     SPassword = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, get_password, [Username, Server]),
  333:     do_verify_format(GroupName, Password, SPassword).
  334: 
  335: do_verify_format(login_scram, _Password, SPassword) ->
  336:     %% returned password is a tuple containing scram data
  337:     {_, _, _, _} = SPassword;
  338: do_verify_format(_, Password, SPassword) ->
  339:     Password = SPassword.
  340: 
  341: %% @doc Set Fields of the Record to Values,
  342: %% when {Field, Value} <- FieldValues (in list comprehension syntax).
  343: record_set(Record, FieldValues) ->
  344:     F = fun({Field, Value}, Rec) ->
  345:                 setelement(Field, Rec, Value)
  346:         end,
  347:     lists:foldl(F, Record, FieldValues).
  348: 
  349: mimctl(Config, CmdAndArgs) ->
  350:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  351:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl_with_args(Node, convert_args(CmdAndArgs), Config).
  352: 
  353: convert_args(Args) -> [ convert_arg(A) || A <- Args ].
  354: 
  355: convert_arg(B) when is_binary(B) -> binary_to_list(B);
  356: convert_arg(A) when is_atom(A) -> atom_to_list(A);
  357: convert_arg(S) when is_list(S) -> S.
  358: 
  359: clean_token_db() ->
  360:     Q = [<<"DELETE FROM auth_token">>],
  361:     ODBCHost = <<"localhost">>, %% mam is also tested against local odbc
  362:     {updated, _} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_query, [ODBCHost, Q]).
  363: 
  364: get_users_token(C, User) ->
  365:     Q = ["SELECT * FROM auth_token at "
  366:          "WHERE at.owner = '", to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(C, User)), "';"],
  367:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_query,
  368:                          [escalus_users:get_server(C, User), Q]).
  369: 
  370: is_xmpp_registration_available(Domain) ->
  371:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Domain, mod_register]).
  372: 
  373: user_authenticating_with_token(Config, UserName, Token) ->
  374:     Spec1 = lists:keystore(oauth_token, 1, escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
  375:                            {oauth_token, Token}),
  376:     lists:keystore(auth, 1, Spec1, {auth, {escalus_auth, auth_sasl_oauth}}).
  377: 
  378: extract_bound_jid(BindReply) ->
  379:     exml_query:path(BindReply, [{element, <<"bind">>}, {element, <<"jid">>},
  380:                                 cdata]).
  381: 
  382: get_provision_key(Domain) ->
  383:     RPCArgs = [get_key, Domain, [], [{provision_pre_shared, Domain}]],
  384:     [{_, RawKey}] = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_hooks, run_fold, RPCArgs),
  385:     RawKey.
  386: 
  387: make_vcard(Config, User) ->
  388:     T = <<"<vCard xmlns='vcard-temp'>"
  389:           "  <FN>Full Name</FN>"
  390:           "  <NICKNAME>{{nick}}</NICKNAME>"
  391:           "</vCard>">>,
  392:     escalus_stanza:from_template(T, [{nick, escalus_users:get_username(Config, User)}]).
  393: 
  394: make_provision_token(Config, User, VCard) ->
  395:     ExpiryFarInTheFuture = {{2055,10,27},{10,54,22}},
  396:     Username = escalus_users:get_username(Config, User),
  397:     Domain = escalus_users:get_server(Config, User),
  398:     ServerSideJID = {jid, Username, Domain, <<>>,
  399:                      Username, Domain, <<>>},
  400:     T0 = {token, provision,
  401:           ExpiryFarInTheFuture,
  402:           ServerSideJID,
  403:           %% sequence no
  404:           undefined,
  405:           VCard,
  406:           %% MAC
  407:           undefined,
  408:           %% body
  409:           undefined},
  410:     T = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, token_with_mac, [T0]),
  411:     %% assert no RPC error occured
  412:     {token, provision} = {element(1, T), element(2, T)},
  413:     serialize(T).
  414: 
  415: serialize(ServerSideToken) ->
  416:     Serialized = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_auth_token, serialize, [ServerSideToken]),
  417:     if
  418:         is_binary(Serialized) -> Serialized;
  419:         not is_binary(Serialized) -> error(Serialized)
  420:     end.
  421: 
  422: to_lower(B) when is_binary(B) ->
  423:     list_to_binary(string:to_lower(binary_to_list(B))).
